alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:43PM EDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Runoff from recent heavy rainfall will cause a prolonged and steady rise on the Wabash River at New Harmony with flooding expected to begin Thursday evening. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 13.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 17.5 feet Thursday, March 31st. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
